title: Snake (Schlange) (in-text plate, page 11) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: One from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 13/16 x 3 3/8" (2 x 8.6 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
